title: College Football Playoff expands to 12 teams
description:
Christine Williamson, David Pollack, and Desmond Howard are joined by Pete Thamel to discuss the College Playoff Expansion being approved for 12 teams. Plus, can Notre Dame's defense take on CJ Stroud? Finally, will Michigan's plan to have two quarterbacks work out?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses breaking news to kick off Week 1
